; 2 = Red team spawn location
; 3 = Blue team spawn location
; 4 = Red flag

; will be calculated using this value)
2 20

; MAP HEIGHT in pixels: 30 * 20 = 400
; MAP WIDTH in pixels: 20 * 20 = 600
